1. Foreign body, left vallecula at the base of the tongue. 2. Airway is patent and stable.

viscous lidocaine nasal spray.context:
Anesthesia:
______ with viscous lidocaine nasal spray.

39-year-old.context: The patient is a 39-year-old Caucasian male who presented to ABCD General Hospital Emergency Department with acute onset of odynophagia and globus sensation.

globus sensation.context: The patient is a 39-year-old Caucasian male who presented to ABCD General Hospital Emergency Department with acute onset of odynophagia and globus sensation.

ingesting some chicken.context: The patient stated his symptoms began around mid night after returning home _________ ingesting some chicken.

ingested a chicken bone.context: The patient felt that he had ingested a chicken bone, tried to dislodge this with fluids and other solid foods as well as sticking his finger down his throat without success.

left vallecular foreign body.context: The patient subsequently was seen in the Emergency Department where it was discovered that the patient had a left vallecular foreign body.

bilateral caudal spurring of the septum.context: There was visualized some bilateral caudal spurring of the septum.

turbinates were within normal limits.context: The turbinates were within normal limits.

posterior nasoseptal deviation to the le.context: There was some posterior nasoseptal deviation to the left.

nasal mucous membranes were pink and moi.context: The nasal mucous membranes were pink and moist.

mass.context: 1. A 1.5 cm white foreign body consistent with a chicken bone at the left vallecular region. There is no evidence of supraglottic or piriform sinuses foreign body. 2. Mild erythema of the right nasopharynx in the region of the fossa Rosenmüller. No mass is appreciated at this time.

ulceration.context: There was no evidence of mass lesion or ulceration in this area, however.

lesion.context: There was no evidence of mass, ulceration, lesion, or obstruction.

obstruction.context: There was no evidence of mass, ulceration, lesion, or obstruction.

mild erythema in the right fossa Rosenm\.context: There was evidence of some mild erythema in the right fossa Rosenmüller.

mass lesion.context: The piriform sinuses were observed without evidence of foreign body or mass lesion.

eustachian tubes were patent without obs.context: The eustachian tubes were patent without obstruction.

1.5 cm left vallecular white foreign bod.context: There was evidence of a 1.5 cm left vallecular white foreign body.

epiglottis was within normal limits.context: The epiglottis was within normal limits and was noted to be omega in shape.

edema.context: There was no evidence of erythema or edema of the posterior commissure, arytenoid cartilage, or superior surface of the vocal cords.

erythema.context: There was no evidence of erythema or edema of the posterior commissure, arytenoid cartilage, or superior surface of the vocal cords.

laryngeal surface of the epiglottis was.context: The laryngeal surface of the epiglottis was within normal limits.

nodularity of the vocal cords.context: There was no evidence of mass lesion or nodularity of the vocal cords.

foreign body.context: The piriform sinuses were observed without evidence of foreign body or mass lesion.

complete glottic closure upon phonation.context: The patient did have complete glottic closure upon phonation and the airway was patent and stable throughout the exam.

airway was patent and stable.context: The patient did have complete glottic closure upon phonation and the airway was patent and stable throughout the exam.

glottic aperture was completely patent w.context: The glottic aperture was completely patent with inspiration.

anterior commissure, epiglottic folds, f.context: The anterior commissure, epiglottic folds, false vocal cords, and piriform sinuses were all within normal limits.

direct laryngoscopy/microscopic suspensi.context: The patient is to go to the operating room for direct laryngoscopy/microscopic suspension direct laryngoscopy for removal of foreign body under anesthesia this a.m. Airway precautions were instituted.
